title: Ticket #2049: condor_procd crashes on SIGHUP
description:
We recently encountered an issue where glideins were getting preempted. Before the preempting remote batch system sent a SIGTERM/SIGKILL combination, it first sent SIGHUP to the entire process tree. All the standard daemons that use DaemonCore re-read their config files, but the condor_procd crashed -- and then the other daemons shut themselves down.

How to Fix

Since condor_procd does not read any configuration files, just ignore SIGHUP.
